comments.body: Can you add this to tests/indexes/common.py using `self.create_index` ? The this should automatically be run for all index types
added. Non-unique `CategoricalIndex` was breaking in a non-obvious way in `_join_non_unique` so have a look a that fix in particular.
in another PR, can come back and move test_insert to datetimelike.py where this can be tested generically (instead of having code *inside* each datetimelike index type)
